import{useMutation,useQuery}from'react-query';import axios from'axios';// export type QrCodeRequest = { qrreceived: string };
export const useGetSettlementUserResponseApi=()=>useQuery(['get_user_settlement_data'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_user_settlement_data/"}));export const uploadCustomerDisbusmentExcelApi=file=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file[0],file[0].name);return{method:'POST',url:"/upload_customer_disbursement_excel/",data:formData};};export const uploadVendorDisbusmentExcelApi=file=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file[0],file[0].name);return{method:'POST',url:"/upload_vendor_settlement_excel/",data:formData};};export const useGetSettlementVendorApi=()=>{return useQuery(['get_vendor_settlement_data'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_vendor_settlement_data/"}));};export const useGeneraeteQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/generate_qr/",data:info.request}));export const useDownloadQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/download_qr/",data:info.request}));export const useReceiveQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/receive_qr/",data:info.request}));
